title: Hand cannon
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Name                                           | Hand cannon                                        |
| :--------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------- |
| Skill                                          | [Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons") |
| [Damage](/Weapon_damage "Weapon damage")       | 16                                                 |
| Accuracy                                       | +3                                                 |
| [Base delay](/Weapon_speed "Weapon speed") (%) | 19                                                 |
| [Min delay](/Minimum_delay "Minimum delay")    | 10 at 18 skill                                     |
| [Hands](/Handedness "Handedness")              | 1H                                                 |
| Size                                           | Little                                             |
| Ranged?                                        | Yes                                                |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A machine that fires bolts via applied alchemy. Some enchant their projectiles to fall forward instead of down, others bewitch their bolts with a fatal attraction to their targets. All are slow, loud, and blast out thick smoke with each shot. |

**Hand cannons** are the strongest one-handed [ranged weapons](/Ranged_weapon "Ranged weapon"), allowing for the use of a [shield](/Shield "Shield") while being much stronger than a [sling](/Sling "Sling"). However, they fire slowly, with a [mindelay](/Mindelay "Mindelay") of 1.0. In addition:

- Hand cannons are particularly [loud](/Loud "Loud") - they create a [noise](/Noise "Noise") of 11 for every shot, enough to attract nearby monsters.
- Hand cannons create harmless, transparent [clouds](/Cloud "Cloud") whenever fired.

|                          | Image                                                                        |
| ------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Mundane**              | [![Hand cannon.png](/images/b/bb/Hand_cannon.png)](/File:Hand_cannon.png)    |
| **Magical**              | [![Hand cannon2.png](/images/e/e6/Hand_cannon2.png)](/File:Hand_cannon2.png) |
| **Artifact**             | [![Hand cannon3.png](/images/2/2c/Hand_cannon3.png)](/File:Hand_cannon3.png) |
|                          | **[Unrandart](/Unrandarts "Unrandarts")**                                    |
| **[Mule](/Mule "Mule")** | [![Mule.png](/images/e/e7/Mule.png)](/File:Mule.png)                         |

## History

- Prior to [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), this item was known as a **hand crossbow**. Hand crossbows only had 15 base damage, but were half as loud and didn't create [clouds](/Cloud "Cloud") when shot. Also, it was less likely for one to generate with a good [brand](/Brand "Brand").
- Prior to [0.30](/0.30 "0.30"), hand crossbows had 17 base damage.
- In [0.29](/0.29 "0.29"), hand crossbows were made heavier (previous stats: 12 damage, +5 accuracy, 15 base delay), and became designated for later portions of the game. They were affected by the [ranged weapons rework](/Ranged_Weapons#History "Ranged Weapons") that applied to all launchers, including the removal of the dedicated [Crossbows skill](/Crossbows_\(skill\) "Crossbows (skill)") and [bolts](/Bolt "Bolt"). Prior to this version, [Hunters](/Hunter "Hunter") and [Arcane Marksmen](/Arcane_Marksmen "Arcane Marksmen") could start with this weapon.
- In [0.15](/0.15 "0.15"), hand crossbows (as well as [arbalests](/Arbalest "Arbalest") and [triple crossbows](/Triple_crossbow "Triple crossbow")) were introduced, replacing the standard [crossbow](/Crossbow_\(item\) "Crossbow (item)").
- In very old versions of *Crawl*, the hand crossbow was a one-handed ranged weapon which fired [darts](/Dart "Dart").

| [Weapons](/Weapon "Weapon")                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| ---------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Axes](/Axes "Axes")                                 | [Battleaxe](/Battleaxe "Battleaxe") • [Broad axe](/Broad_axe "Broad axe") • [Executioner's axe](/Executioner%27s_axe "Executioner's axe") • [Hand axe](/Hand_axe "Hand axe") • [War axe](/War_axe "War axe")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [Maces & Flails](/Maces_%26_Flails "Maces & Flails") | [Club](/Club "Club") • [Demon whip](/Demon_whip "Demon whip") • [Dire flail](/Dire_flail "Dire flail") • [Eveningstar](/Eveningstar "Eveningstar") • [Flail](/Flail "Flail") • [Giant club](/Giant_club "Giant club") • [Giant spiked club](/Giant_spiked_club "Giant spiked club") • [Great mace](/Great_mace "Great mace") • [Mace](/Mace "Mace") ([Hammer](/Hammer "Hammer")) • [Morningstar](/Morningstar "Morningstar") • [Sacred scourge](/Sacred_scourge "Sacred scourge") • [Whip](/Whip "Whip") |
| [Long Blades](/Long_Blades "Long Blades")            | [Demon blade](/Demon_blade "Demon blade") • [Double sword](/Double_sword "Double sword") • [Eudemon blade](/Eudemon_blade "Eudemon blade") • [Falchion](/Falchion "Falchion") • [Great sword](/Great_sword "Great sword") • [Long sword](/Long_sword "Long sword") • [Scimitar](/Scimitar "Scimitar") • [Triple sword](/Triple_sword "Triple sword")                                                                                                                                                     |
| [Polearms](/Polearms "Polearms")                     | [Bardiche](/Bardiche "Bardiche") • [Demon trident](/Demon_trident "Demon trident") • [Glaive](/Glaive "Glaive") • [Halberd](/Halberd "Halberd") ([Scythe](/Scythe "Scythe")) • [Spear](/Spear "Spear") • [Trident](/Trident "Trident") • [Trishula](/Trishula "Trishula")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons")   | [Arbalest](/Arbalest "Arbalest") • [Hand cannon]() • [Longbow](/Longbow "Longbow") • [Orcbow](/Orcbow "Orcbow") • [Shortbow](/Shortbow "Shortbow") • [Sling](/Sling "Sling") • [Triple crossbow](/Triple_crossbow "Triple crossbow")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [Short Blades](/Short_Blades "Short Blades")         | [Dagger](/Dagger "Dagger") • [Quick blade](/Quick_blade "Quick blade") • [Rapier](/Rapier "Rapier") • [Short sword](/Short_sword "Short sword")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [Staves](/Staves "Staves")                           | [Lajatang](/Lajatang "Lajatang") • [Magical staff](/Magical_staff "Magical staff") • [Quarterstaff](/Quarterstaff "Quarterstaff")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [Throwing](/Throwing "Throwing")                     | [Boomerang](/Boomerang "Boomerang") • [Dart](/Dart "Dart") • [Javelin](/Javelin "Javelin") • [Large rock](/Large_rock "Large rock") • [Stone](/Stone "Stone") • [Throwing net](/Throwing_net "Throwing net")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
html:
Hand cannon

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Name Hand cannon
Skill Ranged Weapons
Damage 16
Accuracy +3
Base delay (%) 19
Min delay 10 at 18 skill
Hands 1H
Size Little
Ranged? Yes
A machine that fires bolts via applied alchemy. Some enchant their projectiles to fall forward instead of down, others bewitch their bolts with a fatal attraction to their targets. All are slow, loud, and blast out thick smoke with each shot.

Hand cannons are the strongest one-handed ranged weapons, allowing for the use of a shield while being much stronger than a sling. However, they fire slowly, with a mindelay of 1.0. In addition:

  • Hand cannons are particularly loud - they create a noise of 11 for every shot, enough to attract nearby monsters.
  • Hand cannons create harmless, transparent clouds whenever fired.


Image
Mundane
Magical
Artifact
Unrandart
Mule

History

  • Prior to 0.31, this item was known as a hand crossbow. Hand crossbows only had 15 base damage, but were half as loud and didn't create clouds when shot. Also, it was less likely for one to generate with a good brand.
  • Prior to 0.30, hand crossbows had 17 base damage.
  • In 0.29, hand crossbows were made heavier (previous stats: 12 damage, +5 accuracy, 15 base delay), and became designated for later portions of the game. They were affected by the ranged weapons rework that applied to all launchers, including the removal of the dedicated Crossbows skill and bolts. Prior to this version, Hunters and Arcane Marksmen could start with this weapon.
  • In 0.15, hand crossbows (as well as arbalests and triple crossbows) were introduced, replacing the standard crossbow.
  • In very old versions of Crawl, the hand crossbow was a one-handed ranged weapon which fired darts.
Weapons
Axes Battleaxe • Broad axe • Executioner's axe • Hand axe • War axe
Maces & Flails Club • Demon whip • Dire flail • Eveningstar • Flail • Giant club • Giant spiked club • Great mace • Mace (Hammer) • Morningstar • Sacred scourge • Whip
Long Blades Demon blade • Double sword • Eudemon blade • Falchion • Great sword • Long sword • Scimitar • Triple sword
Polearms Bardiche • Demon trident • Glaive • Halberd (Scythe) • Spear • Trident • Trishula
Ranged Weapons Arbalest • Hand cannon • Longbow • Orcbow • Shortbow • Sling • Triple crossbow
Short Blades Dagger • Quick blade • Rapier • Short sword
Staves Lajatang • Magical staff • Quarterstaff
Throwing Boomerang • Dart • Javelin • Large rock • Stone • Throwing net

{{Flavour|A machine that fires bolts via applied alchemy. Some enchant their projectiles to fall forward instead of down, others bewitch their bolts with a fatal attraction to their targets. All are slow, loud, and blast out thick smoke with each shot.}}

'''Hand cannons''' are the strongest one-handed [[ranged weapon]]s, allowing for the use of a [[shield]] while being much stronger than a [[sling]]. However, they fire slowly, with a [[mindelay]] of 1.0. In addition:
*Hand cannons are particularly [[loud]] - they create a [[noise]] of 11 for every shot, enough to attract nearby monsters.
*Hand cannons create harmless, transparent [[cloud]]s whenever fired.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.31]], this item was known as a '''hand crossbow'''. Hand crossbows only had 15 base damage, but were half as loud and didn't create [[cloud]]s when shot. Also, it was less likely for one to generate with a good [[brand]].
*Prior to [[0.30]], hand crossbows had 17 base damage.
*In [[0.29]], hand crossbows were made heavier (previous stats: 12 damage, +5 accuracy, 15 base delay), and became designated for later portions of the game.  They were affected by the [[Ranged Weapons#History|ranged weapons rework]] that applied to all launchers, including the removal of the dedicated [[Crossbows (skill)|Crossbows skill]] and [[bolt]]s. Prior to this version, [[Hunter]]s and [[Arcane Marksmen]] could start with this weapon.
*In [[0.15]], hand crossbows (as well as [[arbalest]]s and [[triple crossbow]]s) were introduced, replacing the standard [[crossbow (item)|crossbow]].
*In very old versions of ''Crawl'', the hand crossbow was a one-handed ranged weapon which fired [[dart]]s.
